column3: School of Health and Sports Sciences
column5: This Progression Route course is for Registered Nurses and Midwives who hold a Postgraduate qualification in District Nursing or General Practice Nursing. The course is offered in part-time mode over two semesters. Each student will be allocated one academic supervisor. The supervisor will have an appreciation of the chosen area of study and will have a broad understanding of the health and social issues as appropriate to the research topic.Course modulesLevel
